name: Nudestix Stax Blush Balm
about: What it is: A magnetic multistacking and multitasking blush compact that clicks to create your custom color cloud collection..Highlighted Ingredients: - Gelled Emollient Complex: Contains moisture and barrier protection properties..- Green Tea: Diminishes the look of signs of aging..- Rosehip Oil: Rich in vitamin A, moisturizes, and contains properties that diminish visible signs of aging...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also vegan, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and comes in recyclable packaging...What Else You Need to Know: The Stax All Over Color Blush Balm is a magnetic multistacking and multitasking blush compact that click to create your custom color cloud collection. The blush balm contains green tea and rosehip oil to moisturize and diminish visible signs of aging, while a Gelled Emollient Complex contains moisture and barrier protection properties.
ingredients: -Gelled Emollient Complex: Contains moisture and barrier protection properties..-Green Tea: Diminishes the look of signs of aging. .-Rosehip Oil: Rich in vitamin A, moisturizes, and contains properties that diminish visible signs of aging. ..Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Silica, Mica, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Isononyl Isononanoate, Diisostearyl Malate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Phenoxyethanol, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Stearalkonium Hectorite, Propylene Carbonate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Boron Nitride, Rosa Canina Fruit Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Tocopherol, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Tocopheryl Acetate, Tin Oxide [+/- Titanium Dioxide (Ci 77891), Iron Oxides (Ci 77491), Manganese Violet (Ci 77742), Red 40 Lake (Ci 16035)]...Nudestix formulations are updated from time to time as part of our commitment to innovation and maintaining global compliance. Therefore, ingredient lists or claims shown here may differ from the box of the product depending on time and global region of purchase.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply onto cheeks, lips and eyes with fingers or brush and bounce for easy, soft cloud color..-Tip: Mix your STAX and play for infinite customizable cloud combinations.

I love how versatile this product isu2014Ive used it not just on my cheeks, but also on my lips and eyes, making it a true multitasker. It's compact, travel-friendly, and perfect for on-the-go touch-ups. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: Bold Color, Easy Application, but Needs Touch-Ups!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in Magenta Matte, and overall, Im pretty happy with it. The color payoff is bold and vibrant, which I love, especially for a pop of color on the cheeks. The formula is creamy and easy to blend, making it versatile for both lips and cheeks. However, it can feel a bit heavy if layered too much, and it tends to fade faster than Id prefer. Its a fun product for a fresh, bold look, but touch-ups are necessary throughout the day. Still, great for the price point and overall a solid 3.5 to 4 stars.

reviews.review_text: I love this blush! I can't rave enough on how good it is. Slightly creamy with a beautiful finish. It goes on so smooth and blends so well. Pigmented and such a beautiful color. Highly recommend this for an everyday blush.

reviews.review_title: I may have blush blindness but idc!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in Barely Nude, and its quickly become a staple in my routine. With my olive complexion, I often find it challenging to find a blush that looks natural, but this shade is perfect! It gives me a soft, healthy flush that enhances my skin tone without looking too pink or washed out.  The texture is smooth and creamy, making it super easy to blend, and it feels lightweight on my skin. I love that I can build it up for a bit more color or keep it sheer for a subtle glow. Its great for those rushed mornings when I want to look put together but dont have much time.  I also appreciate how multi-functional it is. I've used it on my cheeks, lips, and even as a light wash on my eyelids, which creates a cohesive, natural look. Plus, it lasts throughout the day without needing constant touch-ups.  Overall, Barely Nude is a fantastic choice if youre looking for a versatile, flattering shade that works beautifully with an olive complexion!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nudestix blushes have a creamy, lightweight texture that glides smoothly onto the skin. The creaminess of the product makes it easy to blend with your fingers, a brush, or a sponge, giving a seamless and natural finish.The finish of Nudestix blushes is typically dewy and radiant, giving the skin a healthy, natural glow. This makes them ideal for those who prefer a fresh, no-makeup makeup look. Some versions, like the Nudies Matte, offer a more matte finish for those who prefer less shine.While Nudestix blushes are easy to apply and blend, their longevity is quite impressive. They generally stay put for several hours, though those with oily skin might find that they need to touch up during the day. The blushes tend to fade gracefully, maintaining a natural look even as they wear off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm not really much of a blush user, I think it's because I didn't have a good understanding of it. I was glad to try this product, hoping this would change my perspective. I love the packaging! It's compact, the mirror is very convenient, and I really love the magnetic closure. The cream blush made application go smooth, I didn't have to worry about residue falling everywhere! The product was not only smooth, but also lightweight. I loved the feel and look of it on my skin. This makes me eager to try some other shades, and make blush a permanent part of my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My first impressions of this blush, I LOVE the packaging! Having it be magnetic was pretty clever. The magnetism assists with makeup organization by allowing the same brand of blushes to stack together, encouraging saving space and keeping like products together.   I really liked the consistency of the blush. The creaminess of the blush made it super easy to grab from the pan and apply, no mess. The color I received was Picante Nude. For testing, I swatched on the back of my hand and of course by using it as I would my usual blush after applying my base. To give a visual of myself, Im the shade 315 in Fenty Pro Filtr. The back of the hand swatch test wasu2026. lackluster. The transition from my fingertip where I collected the blush to applying it to the back of my hand was a miss. The pigment seemed to barely show although I could clearly see that I had pigment left behind on my fingertip. When using it on my cheeks, I had to layer a few times to actually get it to show enough that I was okay with it.  Overall, this wouldnt be my first grab for blushes. However, I can say its also its not the worst and the fact that it can also be used on lips and eyes is a positive.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: even tho I got the product for free in exchange for writing the review, Im giving an honest review of it. I legit love this. I use it on my eyes and it helps my shadow stick better and I place it on my cheekbones and it stays all day and isnt drying or cakey like powders are sometimes.  Id def recommend. And these little compacts they comet in are so cute and stackable. Theyre magnetic :)

reviews.review_title: Great staying power. nervous about packaging
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am really enjoying this product so far! I think that the packaging is very clever, but its the only thing Ill remove a star for because Im not convinced that it would be very travel friendly (maybe Im hard on my makeup bag when Im traveling, but I dont think the magnet would be strong enough to stay closed and could cause a whole disaster in there after a day of travel). Thats said, I am loving the color and texture of this product! It reminds me of a powder, but with much more staying power. I prefer using a brush to apply the product, but I imagine applying with my fingers would lay more product for a more dramatic look. All in all, Im a huge fan! It just wont likely end up in my travel bag.

reviews.review_text: After using this product, it's not bad, but it is not great either. it's a nice in-between. the formula is nice and creamy, but it is not the right shade for me.It's to pale on my skin. but someone with a lighter complexion would look better in this shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging concept for this blush line from Nudestix is great! Exceedingly sturdy and secure, so completely safe when tossed into a purse or a travel bag. The stack ability is also innovative in case you want to bring multiple shades without having them take up too much space. The formula itself, however, is nothing new or innovative. Its fine. Not too pigmented, blends well enough. Feels just a little bit flat on the skin and doesnt last all day, unfortunately. Its good, but I have so many that are better so I wouldnt default to this one.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Such a stunning blush. It feels like a cream but goes on like a powder. It lasts all day on the skin. The skincare ingredients are a nice bonus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Omg, this is stunning, I love the beautiful packaging and the shade is so pretty. I cant wait to try the rest of them.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Barely Nude - neutral warm rose tan
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have been using the Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in shade Barely Nude for the past couple of weeks. I have enjoyed using the blush as its easy to apply. The cream to powder finish really helps with the longevity in my opinion. On its own, the blush lasts me 6-7 hours. When I layer with powder blushes, I get more than 8 hours of wear. I also like the texture and finish for applying on my lips. The magnetic packaging makes it easy to use and store as it doesn't take up much space. I havent placed this blush in my on the go makeup bag. I feel as if it would make a mess in my makeup bag. I do like that there is a mirror.This is a clean formula so I feel like I have to use it more often so it doesnt go bad. I do enjoy the formula and like how it doesnt irritate my skin or cause me to break out. The blush applies beautifully with fingers, brush, or sponge. I do prefer to use a dry sponge to apply the blush. I find that using a dry sponge works best for my skin type. I would definitely recommend this blush, just be aware there is only 2.5g of product. Since this is a clean formula I find this to be a good amount as you can use the product up before it expires.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Melon sugar- Nudestix stax all over color balm from Bzzagent in exchange for my review. First and foremost, I have to say that I have never seen or used a product like this. It is such a unique concept. It's like an all in one, lip color, blush and eye color and even a touch of highlight on the skin. On the lips, the color starts off being subtle but it is very buildable so you can get the shade you want. On the skin, it glides on smooth and it is very easy to blend in. A small amount goes a long way. It has a natural glow to it and it is such a pretty color. I even used it as eye shadow and it looked very good. I got a lot of compliments when I used this product. The lip color and face blush is long lasting- stayed for 6 hours in humid weather. I was very impressed. I am looking forward to trying some of the other colors. I definitely recommend this product and I will absolutely buy this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Melon sugar- Nudestix stax all over color balm from Bzzagent in exchange for my review. First and foremost, I have to say that I have never seen or used a product like this. It is such a unique concept. It's like an all in one, lip color, blush and eye color and even a touch of highlight on the skin. reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Its so pigmented and amazing. I received it free of change from BzzAgent, and Im so happy I did!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product in exchange for my honest review. I was pretty impressed by the cream to powder texture. Its blends beautifully and has great pigment. Overall a great blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the cream-to-powder application. It was a very buildable color and made my cheeks feel super smooth. I loved the magnetic case. I do with there was more product as the pan is pretty small!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new go to blush. I love the color barely nude. This blush stays on and is the perfect nude for my skin tone. I will definitely be repurchasing. The formula glides on!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you're on the hunt for a versatile and effortlessly blendable blush, this is a must-try. It offers a soft, natural warmth that enhances your cheeks with a subtle, radiant glow. The balm's creamy texture glides on smoothly, making it easy to build up for a more intense color or to apply lightly for a fresh, dewy look. Overall, it is a great choice for those seeking a refined, understated blush with a touch of elegance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved how creamy and smooth this blush is. It was easy to apply and blend after applying a full makeup face. I also use this on my lips and it leaves a look as if its airbrushed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I think this product is beautiful. I am African American with yellow undertone. It applies beautifully and is subtle in appearance. The texture is extremely soft. I love the packaging as well and how a mirror is included. I like that the top is magnetic making it quick and easy to open and close the product.

reviews.review_title: I really like the color of this blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the color of this blush; it's a perfect shade that gives a nice, natural look. However, I'm disappointed with how long it lasts. After just a few hours, it seems to fade away, and I have to reapply it. I wish it had better staying power. If it lasted longer, it would be my go-to blush. For now, I'm on the lookout for something more durable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The blush is great! I really loved the packaging it is great quality and it has absolutely great design, love the magnetic effect. The product is good but the pigmentation is not that great, i have to use lot of product to get blush effect on my cheek. But overall i still really like the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The blush is great! I really loved the packaging it is great quality and it has absolutely great design, love the magnetic effect. The product is good but the pigmentation is not that great, i have to use lot of product to get blush effect on my cheek. But overall i still really like the product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the texture of this product and it was so easy to blend. I especially love how easy this product is to travel with, from the magnetic case itself to the fact that its multi-use so I don't have to pack as many products. However, I do wish the pigment was slightly more vibrant compared to the photos. But overall I'm happy with it and would be curious to try another shade. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is not the greatest. very little color payoff, and the formula feels super dry and hard to blend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its an ok blush. Its very hard to pick up and get product on the brush or your finger or sponge. Takes a while to build up any color and is patchy at first. Not a lot of product, small pan.  I was hoping for more

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This was so chalky and pale, it barely showed up on my medium tan skintone. It does not match the vibrancy of the pictures. The longevity wasn't great either.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As someone who prefers a bit more pigment in their blush, this product was not really a hit for me. It felt like I was using a lot when the color was just not really there. This product is good for someone who is looking for a blush that is on the natural side. I did enjoy the magnetic seal of the blush so it was easy to carry around. I also liked how there is a mirror with the blush so I am able to apply on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This formula is nice. Its a cream to powder. Super easy to apply and blend. I have shade Picante Nude - warm nude peach and its a health flush of color for my cheeks. It dries down matte and lasts throughout the day. Have tried it as a lip color and surprisingly isnt drying on the lips like I expected. Its a fun way to match a look and also great for on the go. Why i cant give it a higher rating is due to the packaging and value of the product. The way you open it isnt convenient or intuitive and requires some learning due to the few magnets, wish it were smoother. Ive dented the product with the lid and lost some product. If you look at the product size, its small compared to others, so the value isnt great here. Its a nice formula though, so if you dont mind the packaging and pan size, absolutely get this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did receive this product for free in exchange of a honesty review. This blush is very pigmented and it shows natural on the skin. it easy to use, super buttery and blends out beautiful nature look. it gives a nice finishing touch to my makeup looks. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the fourth or fifth shade of this formula Ive purchased and it might be my fave yet! Perfect pop of color and the formula is so unique and long lasting on my skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Good for a sensitive skin like mine. It doesnt dry out or cause any rash on my cheeks. It moisturizes but does not make it oily. Its perfect. I used the barely nude color, its for girlies that prefers a no-makeup look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I did receive this product for free in exchange of a review. This blush is very pigmented and it shows well on the skin. This is the perfect blush for summer and it gives such a healthy glow. A little goes a long way.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love using this product by itself or over powder blush for a glowing look. It is well pigmented and I highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my honest review. Wow this blush is so pretty and goes on so nicely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really love this product. Its highly pigmented and looks great on the skin. Its not a cream, but more of a powder and you have to work really fast to get it placed or you will be out of luck on blending it well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this blush a lot- the color was pretty, and it was very pigmented and long lasting. I did find though that it was a little difficult to blend over top cream products. It dried quickly to a powdery finish so you have to work fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Blends nicely, package has a mirror and magnet to stack other blushes from same line. Last all day after applying setting spray.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this blush..I fell in love with it. It goes on so smoothly and looks amazing.

reviews.review_title: The softest blush balm that I've ever used
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: OMG this is the softest blush that I've ever used !!! The design is really cool with a mirror added to the lid and it is also magnetic . I totally did not expect it. The colour is so beautiful and really pigmented. Just one swipe and you can pick up a lot of . I love how natural the colour is. I think this colour is perfect for a peachy or natural no makeup makeup look. I love the packaging and the colour but what surprise me the most is the texture of this blush. It is so creamy and so soft. It's kinda mousse-like to me. It's so soft just like butter and so easy to apply. This blush is easy to apply and blend . I received one and now I want the whole collection. 10/10 would recommend to anyone !!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful product that is highly pigmented. Be sure to use a fluffy brush or else might appear a bit patchy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got the color Pink Love. My skin has neutral undertone and this color goes well with it. This blush is so soft and smooth! It's easy to blend, buildable, and long-lasting. The cap is magnetic (so cool!). Love love love! u2764ufe0f Would definitely try other colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Prettiest blush! It goes on so smoothly, I can't quite describe the texture but it's a powder balm combo. I would suggest starting off slow because it kind of sets pretty quickly so i'd work in sections. Long lasting nonetheless!
This blush is so creamy and amazing. It blends so smooth and amazing with my make up. This is a must have for my make up routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a complimentary sample. I highly recommend it. This blush has a soft creamy texture that makes it easy to blend. The color is soft and rich in color. I highly recommend it and I will repurchase it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved how creamy and colored this blush was. Longer lasting than expected and beautiful pigment. I thought the actual compact was so cool with the magnet but was worried it would get lost/detached, and thankfully a month into having it, its stayed intact!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: i am beyond obsessed with this blush! the u201ccloudu201d formula falls somewhere between cream and powder and is so buttery on the skin. it blends in seamlessly and i even wear it with no base makeup. the shade picante nude is perfection for mimicking the sunburnt/sunkissed look. so cute!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Let me start with the packaging.. LOVE how it was boxed and absolutely love the actual item packaging. The magnetic closure of the jar is awesome ud83eudd29 plus the other side has a mirror **chefs kiss**. The size of the jar is great not too large for my makeup bag but large enough that it will last. Its texture is creamy but not too soft, its perfect to use with your finger to apply on your cheeks. The pigment matches the color and it blends very well. Its not as bright once applied as other blushes which I really like, because no one wants to  look like a clown after using blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying out this balm I immediately loved it for the pure purpose that it is convenient. Every balm comes with a magnetic mirror that is attached its so perfect to throw in my purse on the go. The texture of the balm is so nice, it can be used as a lip balm. You are getting a 2 for one 1 product, a blush and lip product. Its soft on the face, and the formula is great. Overall would recommend and I now need every color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have been wanting to try the NUDESTIX blush for forever, but was not a fan of its original stick-form packaging, so I was thrilled to see this launch! I have been absolutely loving this blush and it lives up to all the rave reviews. The pink is a perfect spring/summer cool toned pink for my light complexion. The only reason I gave 4 stars, is because I found that it works differently depending on the type of foundation you use. With some, it went on seamlessly and gave a dewey finish, while for others it ended up being more patchy and powdery. Luckily for me, I found a routine that works perfectly so I personally love it and give it five stars, but had to mention that potential issue.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im a fan! The consistency is so nice and light. It looks so smooth on the skin, almost creating an airbrushed look. The coral is perfect on my neutral tan skin! I love the packing! Definitely want to add to the stax! I have loved nudiestix so I was excited for this new product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: it's a pretty color, but honestly disappears on your skin. i have some blushes where i can use the tiniest dot and it looks fab, but this one i felt like i was piling it on and it was literally going on clear or something. i could get it to show up at all :/

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush! The packaging is very useful, I love how the mirror comes off. The texture is creamy and surprisingly easy to blend. The only negative thing is that f you sweat a lot it would melt

reviews.review_title: a new product in my routine
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: NUDESTIX STAX sent me this free sample through the BzzAgent sampling program and I really appreciate it. This Nudestix Stax All Over Color Blush Balm is a must for most makeup collections. I like the way it blends effortlessly because of its creamy formula that gives me a natural, dewy finish. The balm's buildable coverage allows for both subtle and more intense looks which can be suitable for various occasions. Its small and convenient format that can be easily applied on cheeks, lips, and even eyes, perfect for on-the-go touch-ups. The color is pretty and also has a long lasting effect. It's actually a great balm that I would get other shades too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This blush was great! The packaging is certainly interesting with the lid being magnetic with the ability to come off completely. This is a creamier texture which is nice if your skin type is normal but could be an issue if you have super oily skin which I do. Over all I would purchase again!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The pigment is more than I was expecting. I think these are brilliant and they really look lovely on the skin. The more matte finish is usually not something I like on my skin since it usually starts to look weird on my oily skin through out the day. These did not start to separate or start to look weird on the skin. I do think the only downfall is that you still almost have to set this with a powder otherwise it will move or start to fade throughout the day so the wear time is not as long as I would have hoped for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great build able blush. It has a slightly creamy texture but a powder finish. I really like the versatility of this product. You can use it for a natural flushed look as it initially applies very sheer however the product is buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I like it, its not as pigmented as  I like it to be

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Im a big fan of this product and the formula. It is long lasted and this color seems to go with most skin tones

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product is super cute and the packaging makes me reach for it every day! I think it has a gorgeous color finish but does become a bit oily looking/ more on the sheen finish.

reviews.review_title: pigmented blush in a compact container
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: great addition to my make-up routine! this blush is pigmented and had high color payoff, but blends well and is very easy to apply with a brush. The compact is convenient and easily packable. I received this product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is super pigmented! Such a cute shade & doesnt leave me feeling cakey on top of all my makeup! Comes with a cute mirror on the inside of the cap and has a magnetic liddd!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this blush! It is such a pretty color and blends into my skin super well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this blush for the past week and a half, I am so shocked at how smooth it is on my skin. It is so light and airy I almost forgot I was wearing it. In its package it looks like a packed powder but it felt like a smooth buttery cream. And the color Barely Nude was so subtle it was barely there but still gave my cheeks just the light pop of color that I was looking for.  Before I tried this vegan, gluten-free blush I never would have considered wearing blush but this blush is amazing. And the magnetic compact mirror is genius! Definitely picking this up in more colors.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for a couple weeks, I can say I do love the packaging the mirror is super cute and convenient and the magnet close of the mirror and blush works well and is strong it didnt come open or break in my bag at all. However I really wanted to like this color and the consistency, the color payoff is not great on my skin, I have a deep/dark skin tone and this blush barely showed up even when I tried to layer it. For the color to be so bright I expected more of a pop. Also the consistency of the blush was really dry and powdery feeling on the skin. It didnt feel nice going on. I want to try a new color to see if I like it better but overall this was not my favorite blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in Barely Nude delivers a soft, natural flush with its creamy, blendable formula. Perfect for a subtle, everyday look, this versatile balm adds a hint of color to cheeks, lips, and eyes, creating a fresh, dewy finish that enhances your natural beauty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This balm is nourishing, easy to apply, and very wearable due to its lightweight formula. It goes on light but is certainly buildable in application. I didn't have any issues with blending it out. It has a mirror and a magnetic lid, which are both very cute and handy. Overall, this was a beautiful product. I would certainly recommend to those who prefer a light rather than heavy blush look!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product for an entire week, I can say that the melon sugar pink, is a nice powdery blush, thats alitte drying. It took a lot for this blush to show, I swatched it, and I had to use a lot, for it to be visible, a lot throws off the undertone, because I have dark skin. So I couldnt really apply more than a couple swatches. Overall; I really liked this blush, I like the magnet, design, its really cute, and easily portable. But in terms of the color, I didnt really care for it that just, it had a chalky, consistency that could really throw off your undertones, if you used too much.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice blush! I've been liking it so far and it's very buildable if you want more color! I have normal combination skin and for me I think it's more of a creamy than powder blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is a beautiful creamy blush in slim packaging. This shade is perfect for light/fair skin as a barely there flush. Wore it to a wedding weekend and felt great! Stayed put all night. I did received the product for free in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love this blush it's so easy to apply and the color stays all day

reviews.review_title: I need this is my makeup

reviews.review_text: Asfter weeting this beautiful color blush for a few weeks now , Im in love and I think I need all the shades now !!! Its glides on so smooth  and so pretty blends so wonderful with my other makeup products

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was really excited to try this blush balm as balms tend to be very nourishing to the skin and buildable. This balm is all of those things - easy to apply and very wearable due to its lightweight, nondrying formula. It goes on light but is certainly buildable in application. I used it over a pressed setting powder and did not have any issues with blending or patchiness. Overall, this was a beautiful product, but I'd prefer a deeper color for my skin tone. I would certainly recommend to those who prefer a little pop, but not a heavy blush look.

reviews.review_title: Love the color but texture is a bit stiff
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: It is a really pretty color and I love that I can use it on my cheeks and lips. I do wish though that it was more creamy, it can be somewhat difficult to get enough up and to blend out.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new go-to blush! Its smooth to apply and easy to blend. It works well with my skin tone and doesnt feel heavy.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using the Picante Nude in replace of my normal blush and LOVE the Nudestic Star All Over Color Blush Balm.   I saw tons of questions asking if it was cream, Yes its a soft matte cream it applied and looks matte. Doesnt leave my skin feeling dried out - but more of a glowy after look.   Its easily blendable + buildable a lil goes a long way. The color is the perfect peachy color for the sunkissed look! I love the it has Green Tea and Rosehip Oil Ive noticed a moisturized glow to my cheek area when wearing!   Comes in the most adorable compact that includes a mirror (can easily be taken with you ANYWHERE) and its magnetic and snaps together- I love this as often my compartment will break over time from opening/closing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the picante nude shade. It was smooth and creamy, blended in well on my face and is perfect for my complexion. I liked the magnetic opening and the mirror to be handy and easy to use!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got the STAX All Over Color Blush Balm in the Pink Love. It has a mirror and a magnetic lid.  You can multi-stack more STAX products with the built-in magnets. It goes on smooth and can be used for cheeks, eyes, and lips. I put it on my lips and add a clear gloss. Perfect multi-use blush for traveling or to keep in your purse.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved the texture of this, doesnt feel heavy on the skin at all. I use this when I want a really natural look  Nudestix kindly gave me this blush balm for free so that I could review it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this product, the pigment was great and compliments me well

reviews.review_text: I love the packaging for this product so much and wish that the actual product was more pigmented. This took a while to build up on my cheeks since I have a darker complexion and would love to see the formula be redone. They look amazing in pan but the color pay off is not there

reviews.review_title: Carry on easy to apply blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loveee this product by NUDESTIX. One of my favorite things about this product, Nudestix STAX ALL OVER COLOR BLUSH BALM, is that its not only a blush, but it can also be used on your eyes and lips! We love a multipurpose product! Plus its a magnetic multi-stacking makeup compact that can click together to create your own custom collection!  Now onto the product itself! The Stax dream cream has the most amazingly airy, cloud like cushion texture, and it blurs the skin, leaving you with a softly mattified finish! Its super longwearing, its also vegan and stacked with extracts and antioxidants!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in the shade Love & Roses in exchange for my honest feedback, and I have to say, I'm thoroughly impressed. The first thing that caught my eye was the beautiful, rosy hue of the shade Love & Rosesu2014it's the perfect balance of pink and warm tones that complements a wide range of skin tones. One of the standout features of this blush balm is its versatility. I love how easy it is to apply and blend on the cheeks, lips, and even eyes, making it a truly multitasking product. Whether I'm going for a subtle, natural look or building up the color for more intensity, the formula is incredibly buildable and forgiving. The magnetic stacking feature is a game-changer. Its not only convenient but also will be fun to mix and match different shades to create a custom color palette. Plus, knowing that the formula contains nourishing ingredients like green tea and rosehip oil, which help moisturize and diminish the signs of aging, makes me feel even better about using it regularly.  Another thing I appreciate is that the product is vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free, with eco-friendly packaging. It's refreshing to see a brand thats committed to creating clean, responsible beauty products. Overall, I absolutely love the color and versatility of the product. It's become a staple in my daily routine, and I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a multifunctional, skin-friendly blush.

reviews.review_title: Perfect for the soft-glam/ natural make-up look
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product free in exchange for my honest opinion. The packaging of the product is very unique. The container is magnetize to keep the product closed until you are ready to use. When you are ready to use you simply just pull it apart. Having a mirror in the top of the container is very nice for doing touch-ups on-the-go. The blush is cream base, so it is very easy to swipe on with your fingers or a sponge. To achieve the max pigmentation of this product I would recommend using your fingers. I tried it with a brush and it was not noticeable at all on my skin. If you are into soft-glam or natural/ no make-up look I would recommended this product. It comes off really easily and it did not clog my pores. The product has a shelf life of 6 months after opening so, if you do not wear make-up daily you would not get the max use of this blush.

reviews.review_title: Stax All Over Color Blush Balm
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: If you're looking for a versatile beauty product that effortlessly enhances your natural glow, the Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in Picante Nude is a game-changer. This shade is a warm, earthy nude with a hint of terracotta, perfect for adding a subtle flush of color that complements all skin tones.  The balm's creamy texture makes it incredibly easy to blend, whether you're using it on your cheeks, lips, or even as an eyeshadow. It melts seamlessly into the skin, leaving a dewy finish that looks fresh and natural. The pigmentation is just rightu2014buildable for a more intense look, but soft enough for a sheer wash of color.  One of the standout features of this blush balm is its versatility. It's compact and easy to carry, making it perfect for on-the-go touch-ups. Plus, the formula is hydrating without feeling greasy, so its ideal for those with dry to combination skin.  Overall, the Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in Picante Nude is a must-have for anyone who loves multi-use products that deliver on quality and convenience. It's a beautiful, everyday shade that adds a warm glow to your complexion, making it a staple in any beauty routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this multi-tasking blush. can use for eyes, lip, cheeks. Very convenient when you dont have much time or minimal makeup for travel.

reviews.review_title: Great blush for your daily makeup!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin

I highly recommend this blush for anyone that is looking for a mude pink shade, and loves a settle, yet stunning look. This blush is not cakey, onor patchy and looks heautiful on any skin tone!

reviews.review_title: Love these and cant wait to get more
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really fell in love with this blush the very first time I used it! It is now my go to which I am a huge blush girly and have been before it started trending like in recently. I love that it is matte and reminds me a lot of  of powder blush which is my favorite.

reviews.review_title: A must have on my set makeup

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really good product I'm glad this color was sent to me. It enhances my skin to make it look like I have a warm tan. I absolutely glow when I wear this. The pan is a little small compared to the packaging.otherwise this doesn't have a smell and blends really nicely against the skin. You can go really bold or light and sun-kissed (product name). It does stay on longer compared to similar brands who claim to do the same thing. I wore a greasy sunscreen under this and it does stay in place.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this new product its been added to my everyday location! Its a gorgeous unique color that I dont normally seek but have been pleasantly suprised with. I do think the color will be better in winter when Im a little more pale and it can be more vibrant. But I have been enjoying using it on my cheeks, eyes, and lips to make the look very natural. If I had any complaints it would be that its very light and takes a long time to build up to get really any coverage. I also found that a fluffy brush doesnt seem to pick up any pigment so I usually stick to a small powder puff.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift in exchange for a review. I was not expecting much pigment but wow, it proved me wrong. A little goes a long way and the color is beautiful. I love the packaging as well as Ive never seen a magnetic cover so its super convenient and cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this as a gift in exchange for a review. I was not expecting much pigment but wow, it proved me wrong. A little goes a long way and the color is beautiful. I love the packaging as well as Ive never seen a magnetic cover so its super convenient and cute.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Really enjoy using this blush. It's different in that it's a cream-to-powder application vs. the traditional powder blush, but I like it regardless. The melon sugar color is good and is very natural. I am relatively fair skinned and it blended in very nicely. The compact is also really cool and unique, which is an added plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I haven t tried anything from Nudestix in a while, so I was excited to try this All Over Blush Balm in Magenta Matte. I think the packaging is adorable and sleek and I like the magnetic mirror that you can detach. I applied this both with a brush and fingers and found fingers to be the easiest way. I find this blush easy to blend but I do find it to be more of a powder than a cream blush but that's okay as I still enjoy it. I did notice it lasts for most of the day and overall im happy with the performance.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After trying this product a few weeks gotta say I'm so grateful  for it. It's packaging is slim and magnetic  with a mirror thats a plus. It is a creamy to powder so if you got a dry face is best to use a good primer or facecream. I personally use it on my lids for perfect natural look. It's long lasting for me so when it fades it doesn't patch.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Yes, this is awesome! I'm definitely going to buy every single shade of these! The formula is so smooth, soft, and buttery. It feels like a satin cream/powder. Its perfect for me. I found cream/liquid blush and never went back to powder. Sometimes I miss the finish of a powder, but it always has such a dry look. This solves that! It's the perfect in between product. Also the packaging is just bonus. The magnetic top, stacking capability and the mirror make this a perfect on-the-go blush.   Ok so for the color, Barely Nude. Yeah it is definitely barely nude. I had to build it up a bit to see it because of my tan, but this will be soooo gorgeous on a pale skin. It's like a blush and bronzer mixed together which I also love. I did try this on my lips and didn't like it. It was too powdery and looked weird. On the eyes, loved.   *I did receive this for free to review, but these are my own true thoughts.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: If you want a natural look this blush is perfect. I love it I just apply my concealer and blush and my face looks Stunning. I love that it has its  mirror is a grab and go.

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Barely Nude - neutral warm rose tan

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin

I love how versatile it isu2014I can use it on my cheeks, lips, and even as an eyeshadow for a cohesive look. Plus, its compact and easy to carry, making touch-ups a breeze. This blush balm has quickly become a staple in my makeup routine!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been loving the NudeStix Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in Love & Roses, and it has quickly become a favorite in my makeup routine. The best part is that it leaves a matte yet healthy finish, which I find perfect for everyday wear. It never looks greasy or shiny, just a soft, natural flush.  The multitasking aspect is a big plus too. Ive been using it on my lips and even my eyelids for a cohesive look, and it works beautifully. The packaging is also super convenient for travel or on-the-go touch-ups.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Normal skin

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Barely Nude - neutral warm rose tan

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: NudeStix Stax' All Over Color Blush Balm in Love & Roses is such a super fun product! More importantly, this blush is absolutely gorgeous and performs just as well! The formula itself is light & airy; however, when applied to the skin, it provides a soft, blurring effect to the skin that leaves me cheeks looking & feeling years younger with warm, healthy vibe. I can't get enough of this formula and yes, it's left me wanting more shades. The packaging is uniquely fun & allows me to keep all my favorite shades together with the ingenious magnetic system! The Nudestix team didn't miss a beat with these Nudestix Stax All Over Blush Balms. The component even includes an adorable mirror for on the go application & touch ups! An optimal performing product that looks amazing and lots of fun....what's not to love?!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_title: Versatile, Natural, and Perfect for Everyday Wear!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The NUDESTIX Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in Barely Nude is a standout in my makeup collection. Compared to other blush balms Ive tried, this one has a creamy, blendable texture that feels lightweight and natural on the skin. The shade Barely Nude is perfect for adding a subtle flush of color that enhances my complexion without looking too heavy or overdone.  One of the major benefits of this product is its versatility. It works beautifully as a blush, but Ive also used it on my lips and eyes for a cohesive, monochromatic look. The compact packaging makes it easy to carry around, so it's perfect for touch-ups throughout the day.  I would definitely buy this product again. The formula is hydrating and long-lasting, which is a big plus for my dry skin. Id highly recommend the NUDESTIX Stax All Over Color Blush Balm to my friends and family, especially those who love a natural, effortless makeup look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin

reviews.review_text: The product was a pretty color, but I had to work to get the pigment to transfer onto my brush and then skin. It just didnt glide on as smoothly as some of my other blushes. The magnetic top is a cool feature to have though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: This color is so beautiful. Its the most flattering pink shade. You can make this look very natural or layer it up on your cheeks for a more dramatic pigment. Its so pretty on the lips, again, can do a single layer for more neutral natural look or build it up. I love it on my eyes. It compliments my brown eyes very well, I think darker pinky hues compliment brown eyes great. Its a 3 in 1 product, always love that. Plus its magnetic with a mirror too which I thought was very different. Just make sure you dont lose the mirror part or your makeup wont be covered and safe!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the packaging of this product. It is magnetic and the lid has a small mirror on it. The lid is completely removable and it can be stacked with other shades on the top, which I think is very cool and fun to use. It is very thin and I think it would be great for traveling.  The product looks very bright and has an interesting, play-doh like texture. I tried to use it with my fingers, which left fingerprint marks on the product. The product itself is buildable and light. If you're not very white, this could look a little ashy on you or might not even show up. If it shows up, it's a very nice, bright, lively, cool-toned pink and I like it. It isnt drying but isnt too oily as well, so i think all skin types can use this without any issues. Overall, I dont think it is for everyone, especially if you have a deeper skin tone, but if the color works for you, I would recommend it!

reviews.review_title: With all the other blush options out there, skip

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin

The color is this perfect blend of bold and soft, and it just melts into my skin. It's so easy to apply and blend out for a natural flush of color. Plus, it lasts all day without drying out my skin. I can't stop reaching for it! I have gotten tons of compliments from family and friends and have even been asked which blush product I am using so that whoever is asking can buy it too! I want to get the entire collection of the u201cStax All Over Color Blush Balmu201d because they are adorable and they are magnetic and stack on top of each other! How cool, right?!

At that price point I expect color payoff.  Honestly, I have much better products from the drugstore in my collection. These blushes will one show up on the palest of the pale despite their deceptive marketing that suggest these are great for all skin tones.

The texture is somewhere between cream and powder, I really love it. The packaging is interesting, the magnet collects all of my bobby pins in my makeup bag.
