reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Id like to extend my thanks to NUDESTIX for the opportunity to test their product in exchange for an honest review. First off, the packaging is worth highlighting. I really appreciate the magnetic closure; it's both functional and satisfying to use. I often find myself opening and closing the blush just for the pleasure of the magnetic snap. Regarding the product itself, it's very creamy and soft. However, achieving strong pigmentation requires multiple swipes, which was a bit disappointing. On the positive side, once applied, the blush blends seamlessly into the skin, delivering a natural, subtle glow. The color is delicate and understated, providing a soft, natural finish. I recommend this shade for anyone seeking a soft, natural look. Im looking forward to trying the shade Love and Roses next and keeping it safely away from my sister!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked this cream blush! The color was perfect for my light/medium skin with olive undertones and it gave me such a cute sun kissed look. The cream took a bit to blend in nicely by the color lasted once applied. I liked the stackability of the packaging and the magnetic close lid. Super cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product was sent to me in exchange for my honest review. I was extremely disappointed by the execution of this product, as Nudestix typically does these types of universally flattering, cream complexion products very well. Unfortunately this wasnt the case, as the shade I was sent looked more ashy than the warm nude peach color in the pan. component itself is really cool, it comes with a nice mirror thats also magnetic so the product isnt easily damaged. I also did think the velvety, soft matte cream-to-powder texture of the blush was really innovative, but its honestly unwearable for me. As you can see from the swatches, the blush loses all its warmth against my medium tan skin and once blended there really isnt any color payoff

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product, I would not recommend it for those with a darker complexion as it is not that pigmented and does not show up on the skin that well. Although the packaging is nice and convenient, the blush itself shows up as chalky once applied.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The NudeStix Stax Picante Nude is a very nice blush! It is very pretty and pigmented. I found it to dry fast on a cream foundation causing blending to be a little difficult. I did try with a powder foundation and found it easier to blend out with a powder foundation! It left a nice semi powdery finish after it applied and blended out. Once baked down it stayed nicely pigmented as well!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I liked this blush a lot- the color was pretty, and it was very pigmented and long lasting. I did find though that it was a little difficult to blend over top cream products. It dried quickly to a powdery finish so you have to work fast.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the first time I come into contact with this brand. Actually its amazing me.The texture is so soft and very easy to apply. It looks very natural on the face and is very suitable for daily makeup.definitely will be purchase color color

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the packaging and its a perfect shade for a no makeup look.u2014 very easy to apply. Im excited to try the other shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was sooooo hoping to love this product considering the u201cstackingu201d concept appears convenient, but Im not sold! I got the shade u201cCheeky Coralu201d and there was no immediate color payoff. I had to apply like 3 layers for it to slightly appear on my skin! Plus, if the outer packaging becomes greasy. 84 wont close! I plan to keep it but I doubt it will be something I grab often.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful Nude Shade But Not Longlasting
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this color; its a beautiful nude on my medium/warm skin. I got a lot of compliments and looked really flushed all morning. It faded by mid-afternoon and was not really noticeable at all by the evening. I really like the packaging; its small and travel-friendly. The mirror is nice and I love the magnetic closure. I would still repurchase even though I would need to reapply during the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the packaging, very travel friendly.  However the product itself is underwhelming. The product was a little difficult to work with, not as creamy as I was expecting.  I wore this all day and ran errands while also trying to stay cool in this 100+ degree weather in Las Vegas.  After two hours the color already faded.  For reference I have combination skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Thank you to Nudestix for the complimentary blush for an honest review. Although this blush is marketed as a balm, it actually has more of a velvety cream texture. Unlike the original bright orange Picante blush stick, this shade is a light coral, making it a great summer shade for someone like me with fair skin.  I was initially skeptical that this product would work for me, as cream products usually don't last long on my oily skin, especially in the summer heat. However, I was pleasantly surprised that, with just a bit of setting powder, the blush lasted through a 6-hour bartending shift outside in 90+ degree heat (see photo). I ended up loving this formula so much that I purchased it in the Love & Roses shade.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this product to start it is nice and compact and its easy to store. I can throw it into my purse and it doesnt take up much room. Its great for on the go because its multi use you can use it on your cheeks, eyes or lips. It has a really good magnetic hold on the product so you dont have to worry about opening up. My favorite place is onto my cheeks and it gives a nice sun kissed look. It does not leave you feeling sticky. I I use my fingers to apply.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is by far my favorite blush! The pink love cream blush goes on so smoothly, blending effortlessly into my skin and leaving a beautiful, highlighted shade of pink on my cheeks. The color is just perfectu2014subtle yet radiant, giving me a natural look. I was also so fascinated with the magnetic closure; it's such a unique and satisfying touch that adds to the overall experience. The packaging feels luxe and keeps the product secure, making it a joy to use every time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush! Used it for the first time and its amazing! The ease of using compared to regular powder blush is amazing. The color is so beautiful, it leaves a very warm and rosy glow. I like how easy it is to apply and blend. The texture is creamy and velvety.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this, it's great for travel. Has great pigment and it's great to put even on top of powder.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Easy to use blush, love the magnetic mirror. The color goes on smoothly amd lasts all day. I use a brush or fingers to apply. Love this. Glad I was given the option to try for free in return of a review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Such a unique formula its so beautiful. Goes on cream to powder. I love that the ingridients are clean too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: its a super beautiful blush perfect for summer! its not super pigmented so you have to build it up but it gives a natural finish! I have pretty tan skin and it compliments me so well for the summers

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product has converted me from powder to balm! Im a fan! I have used this brand before and I have enjoyed all of their products. I have dry skin so the balm works so well for my skin type. I do put a setting powder on top and its been a great combo! I would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a pretty basic makeup girlie. I do the exact same makeup routine every time I wear makeup. This routine has served me so well for the past 15 years that there have only been slight changes in it. From step-by-step, to amount of product, to product placement, to the products themselves, there is very little change in my routine. One of the few items I use is bronzer - with my face and skin, heavy makeup doesn't look good so my contouring (if you could call it that) is done with powdered bronzer that I apply lightly with a brush. Since I don't use much of this and I'm not TRULY contouring, I've been able to get away with cheaper, lower quality options. I used the Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in the color Sunkissed and OMG... I am never going back! I use it the same way I always have, with a brush, but it packs so much punch from pigment to blending to blurring! It is the BEST I've ever used and I love it so much that I'll be going back to get a Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in my blush color as well.   I'm telling you, I'm a convert and you will be too! (And this is coming from someone who only uses powdered makeup with the exception of concealer!)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Looks flawless on the skin, and has a great texture.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush so much. It is so easy to apply for a beginner with makeup like me! The ease of using compared to regular powder blush is amazing. The color is so beautiful, it leaves a very warm and neutral natural glow. I like how easy it is to apply  and how creamy and soft it feels.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush so much. The color is absolutely beautiful, it leaves a very warm, natural glow as if you just came back from vacation with a beautiful tan. I love how it melts into the skin and how creamy and soft it feels. I love my complexion when I use this blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product over the past few weeks, I am loving it! Its so pigmented, one dap on your brush and youre good to go. The packaging is my favorite part it has a mirror so its so convenient to take on the go

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is gorgeous. I received the color, u201cMelon Sugaru201d, which looks great on my neutral skin tone. I absolutely love the magnetic case it comes in with the handy, built-in mirror. The blush is smooth and glides on perfectly over your foundation or on bare skin. The color is long lasting as well. Ive just been wearing with on my bare skin because the color is so pretty.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Im obsessed! This blush is everything I could want. First off, the packaging is phenomenal! It has a strong magnet that keeps the lid firmly in place to avoid any damage to the product itself. Its very satisfying to open and close. The blush then has this rich, creamy texture. The vibrant pink of shade u201cPink Loveu201d is buildable but can also be subtle by blending with a brush or even your fingers. I personally like to apply it with my finger tips which allows the product to warm a bit and melts right into my cheeks. You could also use this on your lips or even eyelids if desired. I have nothing but positive thoughts on this blush!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy using this product - its pigmented and buildable as well. It lasts on my skin for a good amount of time. It is also compact and the magnetic top is pretty cool. I received this product in exchange for an honest review, but I would buy this product with my own money. I would also recommend it to friends and family.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this blush it is very beautiful and leaves my skin sunkissed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First I definitely loved the little container it came in and with the mirror attached so its great to throw in your purse when you need a touch up. I thought the color also went on very well. It was almost silky, didnt feel caked or anything like that. I liked the color and the pigment is very pretty. You could use either your finger or a brush to put it on. I did feel like it didnt last as long as some of my other blushes but I do like how the I ingredients seem to be a lot better.

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I LOVE the packaging of this and think it is nice that it can stack of other ones. The blush is easy to apply and blends nicely with my skin. I also like that the size is nice and will be easy to carry.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In the last week of using this product, I can confidently say that I like this product. It is compact and convenient, especially if you're on the go. It's great for touch ups throughout the day because of the built in mirror. I love how creamy and smooth it is and application is seamless. It's not overly pigmented, and blends with the rest of my makeup seamlessly! Definitely would recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While the blush inside is nice, blendable, and a great color for my light skin, I think the real innovation is the component which is both interesting and the only complaint I have. I like the idea of being able to stack a few components together for travel, and this is definitely slim and secure so it's good for that purpose. However, I do find the magnets a bit too strong for me to use when I've got foundation remnants and whatever on my hands, so that's the only downfall! Otherwise, the blush itself is lightweight and so cute -- can't say it's too longlasting on my oily face in this ridiculously humid summer, but I think once I stop sweating, it'll last a decent time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THIS IS THE BLUSH YOU HAVE BEEN WAITING YOUR WHOLE LIFE FOR! It is STACKABLE! Like what? I got the shade Barely Nude, I need the rest of the collection STAT! No wonder if sold This is an all over blush meaning you can contour with this blush and it looks flawless. It is such a natural hue on your cheekbones. It will give your face life. Pair this with a great moisturizer and primer and baby you will be turning heads as you walk. This is a must have in the make up bag.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a really neat and innovative product. The formula does live up to the blurring claims -- on lighter skin, it can be built up to be noticeable and creates a blurred look on the cheek. I will say I like applying it with a brush more than fingers, as the formula is a bit too stiff for even application with the fingers. This reminds me of a more blurring, less glowy MAC Play blush. The barely nude colour is a beautiful, natural colour. I find the packaging quite innovative. It is maybe not the best to travel with, but is so easy to use, compact, and I love that it stacks on top of other blushes in this line.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this so much, its portable and it has a tiny mirror. The color is so pretty and gives me a natural flush. The formula is so smooth and buttery and just so easy to dab on and blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Stax Blush Balm in Picante Nude is fantastic. It has great pigment, so just a small amount gives a nice pop of color. It blends easily with fingers or a brush, making application smooth and even. I also love that it's moisturizing, keeping my skin hydrated and feeling comfortable all day. This blush gives a natural, vibrant look and is a great addition to any makeup routine. Highly recommend it! Stays on all day!

reviews.review_title: A little pricey for the color payoff
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: First, I have to say the packaging is really cool, the lid comes off and is magnetic, plus a mirror is always nice. The color is very subtle, you may need to apply a good amount, and for such a small amount, it is a little pricey compared to the drugstore alternatives. Overall I like it for the packaging but would probably not purchase in the future.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Out of almost all of my entire makeup step routine blushi is my favorite makeup step because it brings back color and a liveliness to the face. I was disappointed with this blush especially on deeper tones because of the lack of versatility in pigment for vast complexions. The color barely shows on my skin as more than ash. This is upsetting considering the packaging idea is pretty cool but whats matters most is the product. $

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nudestix sent me this Stax All Over Color Blush Balm for free through the BzzAgent Sampling Program, in exchange for my honest review. The color of the blush is beautiful, but its not very pigmented. I needed to use quite a bit of product to get the look/color I wanted. Because of that, I dont think it would last very long. Its very silky and light on the skin, not cakey at all and didnt clog my pores. The packaging is very slim and sleek and theres a mirror inside, making it great for on the go.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The Pink Love color blush by NudeStix offers a perfect pop of color with its silky texture and buildable formula. It blends effortlessly for a natural, radiant finish that lasts all day. Ideal for any skin type, this blush adds a healthy glow without looking overdone. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a versatile and long-lasting blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the blush balm you need even if you are not a blush person but want to try one. It's effortless, not shiny, it's matte but not drying. I'd skip all my other blushes and go for this one. it's a sun kissed look. But like a good one. Easy application. Just a big yes yes yes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I received a free sample of this and actually liked it more than I thought I would. This pink is really nice on my skin tone (medium tan) and is long lasting. The cream formula is really nice as well. The packaging is very sleek and cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nudestix kindly gave me this blush balm for free so that I could review it and honestly I love it! The color is a nice nude. Formula is very soft,buildable and very unique. I love how you can also use this on your eyes and lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! The packaging is really clever with the magnetic closure. And its so easy to apply and build. The color is so pretty on my skin. I would definitely purchase again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is amazing and goes on very smoothly. The mini mirror on the top is very convenient to use the blush when on the go. I love the sleek design of the blush and would definitely recommend this!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The pigment on this was A M A Z I N G!! It stayed on all day and you only had to use a little bit to get a bright sun kissed vibe. My go to summer color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Great Blush. I love the feeling, it's lightweight and doesn't cake up. Smells great, easy to apply. I wish the pigment was a little more vibrant but it is buildable to achieve the desired color. Magentic closure on the container is very unique.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Nudestix Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in Magenta Matte is my new favorite go-to blush. I was worried the color might be too bright, but it was perfect.  The color is absolutely gorgeous and it's buildable so you can add less for a lighter look or go all out for a more bold look. The color also lasts all day and gives you a beautiful flush. I'm so glad I discovered this product because it's truly one of the best blushes I've ever tried. You can blend it with your fingers or a brush.  Note: I received this product for free in exchange for writing a review, but all opinions are my own.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love how its magnetic the little mirror is a plus. Now the product alone its amazing I love how its so pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush has the perfect color payoff and longevity. Its great for my light to medium sensitive skin. It has great reviews for a reason. Its good quality and has a very pretty effect on my skin

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I enjoy this blush. It is a nice cool toned pink that gives a cute little natural blush moment. It has a natural, satin finish. It is great for beginners because it is easy to blend and work with. It sheers out to a natural pink color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first blush. I dont do blush. I feel its too flashy too much and this blush changed my whole mind. Its a set color its creamy but yet when you apply it it solves I already bought some different shades and I will be buying more I recommend this product. I feel like I just discovered blush for the first time honestly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product is great. I loved the packaging, its so sleek and beautiful. The product is not extremely pigmented, but it is buildable which is amazing. The texture is amazing because the product feels like a mixture of a cream/powder formula. I love the way it applies to my skin and looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product courtesy of Nudestix via Buzzagent and think it is perfect for a natural makeup look. It would be awesome if it could go over foundation, but on the bright side it has better longevity over merit balm brush. This might not be the best for a full glam aesthetic, but if you want a natural minimal makeup look, this may be your cup of tea.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Wow. This blush is 100% my new holy grail product. The packaging is so neat. The mirror is magnetic to the blush and can also be stacked to other blush colors in the NudeStix line! The cheeky coral shade is perfect for my medium neutral skin tone! I love how it is a cream balm but dries down like a powder. It is not greasy at all!  I absolutely love this blush and highly recommend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I recently tried the NUDESTIX Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in Sunkissed, and unfortunately, it didn't quite meet my expectations. One major issue I encountered was with the packaging; the magnetic lid came off easily when I accidentally dropped it, which made the overall feel of the product quite unreliable.  As for the texture, I found it quite disappointing. I tested it on both my lips and cheeks, and in both cases, I needed to apply a significant amount to get any noticeable color. On my lips, it not only took a lot of product to show up but also left them feeling dry and powdery. Similarly, on my cheeks, the texture wasnt ideal and didnt blend well, leaving a finish that felt uncomfortable.  While I understand that makeup products can be quite subjective and this might work for others, it just wasnt the right fit for me. Unfortunately, I dont have much positive to say about this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: *I was gifted this product in exchange for review by bzzagent* I received the color magenta matte and it is heavenly! A little goes a long ways and it creates the perfect pink!! I would recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love the sleek packaging with a mirror! The pigment is very buildable and great for everyday use. Very blend-able! Will be my new everyday blush

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Its out of stock for a reason! Omg its probably the best blush products Ive used in so long! Very pigmented but so beautiful on my skin tone. Where contour shade meets natural cheek tone! Easy to apply and lasting on the skin as well! Would highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My favorite blush balm! Nudetix gifted me this product in exchange for my honest opinion! I love the texture of this blush balm. I use it everyday for work because its easy to apply with a sponge or a brush! I got the shade barely nude and its a great everyday neutral color!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the color, texture and packaging of this product! Very nice, but this product fades very fast. Would love to see a longer last formula.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The creamy formula blends really well and had great staying power. The rosy coral color suited my skintone perfectly, even as an eyeshadow and lip color. I also love the magnetic compact design and handy little mirror!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Love this product! I tried the Picante nude and it's such a rich beautiful color. The product is so creamy and blends well with both a brush and a sponge. Definitely going to try some of the other shades that are offered.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a color I dont usually go far as I am darker but I did find that it was still quite pigmented and very easy to use. I loved the magnetic part of this and the mirror was also very handy. I would definitely put this in my bag for easy reapplication!

reviews.review_title: Absolutely in love with this product
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have continuously used this since the day I received this. The color is a nice soft peach for fair skin tones, making my cheeks look healthy and fuller. It has cream to powder finish making it last long and is super easy to blend. I 100 % recommend this one!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Its creamy texture makes application smooth and effortless, blending beautifully into the skin for a natural flush. The soft matte finish is perfect, giving a fresh, long-lasting look without being too shiny. Plus, its compact packaging is ideal for on-the-go touch-ups. Overall, this blush balm is a versatile and convenient option for achieving a flawless, natural-looking glow.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: THE BEST BLISH WOW IM AMAZED the best product!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush balm in the shade Barely Nude is perfect for my fair skin. I apply it with a blush brush and you only need a little bit for the perfect wash of color. The packaging is compact and innovative! I really like how the mirror u201cstacksu201d onto the blush balm. Product lasts all day long for me without reapplying.

reviews.review_title: A MUST! Best Blush formula I've tried
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in Pink Love really stands out with its versatile and creamy formula. Unlike other blush balms I've used, this one blends effortlessly into the skin, giving a natural, dewy look. You can build it up for a subtle flush or a bolder pop of color, which makes it great for all kinds of occasions. Plus, since its an all-over color product, you can use it as a blush, on your lips, or even your eyes, adding a level of convenience and versatility that a lot of other single-purpose products just dont offer. The ability to use it on multiple areas of the face makes it a great option for streamlined beauty routines. Id totally recommend the Stax All Over Color Blush Balm to my friends and family. Its a fantastic product for anyone wanting a versatile, easy-to-use, and high-quality blush balm that gives a gorgeous, natural finish.

reviews.review_title: Nice and easy to blend blush
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this blush a few times and am really liking it! I was nervous the bright magenta would be too bold and hard to blend, but this formula blends very easily and the color is fun but not intense. If you want a brighter color, a different product might work better, but I love how easy this one is to blend. The packaging is really cool too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the creamy texture, its very pigmented but natural looking and I like the packaging

reviews.review_title: A solid blush for everyday wear
reviews.review_buyer_description: Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this cream blush! It applies smoothly onto my skin. It doesnt leave you looking chalky after a long day and its staying power is amazing. The color I purchased is perfect for my skin tone with everyday use. I also like that its magnetic because something this small could be so easy to lose.   As a disclaimer, I  did receive this product for free to test in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_title: super unique in a saturated market
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Ill be forthright and admit that I loooove blush, so I was very excited for these nudestix blush stackers. The market for blush is so saturated, but these bring something unique to the table. I got the shade u201cBarely Nudeu201d, and for reference my skin is light neutral olive.  First, the packaging: I love the magnetic closureu2014its both sleek and very convenient and the magnet is strong enough that I can throw it in my bag for on the go. Usually my issue with blush pans is that they get gunky over time, and while it hasnt been long enough to completely rule out this issue, Id bet that this would be less of an issue because of the stiffer formula. While moves us on to:  Formula: the formula was completely unlike anything I expected. I thought it would be a melty, creamy balm, but its not melty at all. It almost feels like powdered blush in the pan, but it applies like a cream.  Application: I prefer applying it with a finger, because I feel like the little bit of heat from my fingers helps it blend in.   Shade: barely nude is a beautiful sun kissed flush, though its way more pigmented than I expected (in a good way!). I barely need a fingertips worth per cheek. Blushes run orange on me, and while this one has a touch more warmth than what I prefer, I think its very natural looking, like I got too much sun.  Value: I feel like the one drawback is that this blush is small with only 2.5 g of product. I totally get that if youre looking for a staple blush to wear everyday, this might not be the one, but I honestly prefer the small size because theres a better chance I can use it up before it expires. Plus I like the idea of stacking multiple of the and getting to decide between a few colors. Because Ive bought luxury blushes in the past, Im less inclined to reject it based on dollar value alone, but ymmv.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Stax All Over Color Blush Balm in Magenta Matte is a standout product for anyone seeking a vibrant, versatile blush. The magenta shade provides a striking pop of color that can easily be blended for a natural flush or built up for a bolder look. The matte finish gives a modern, sophisticated touch without adding shine. The balm's creamy texture glides smoothly over the skin, making application effortless and ensuring it blends seamlessly with other makeup products. Its long-lasting formula means you can count on it to stay put throughout the day. Overall, it's an excellent choice for those wanting a high-impact blush that offers both flexibility and staying power.

Despite this, I am excited to try the Love & Rose shade, as the overall quality and ease of use of this product have won me over. Highly recommend giving it a try, just find the shade that suits you best!

reviews.review_title: This Blush looked so beautiful on my skin ud83eudd29
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I can not deny that this blush is gorgeous. For starters the packaging is cool and innovative. Great for travel and on the go. I appreciate the magnetic top that clasps shut. The blush has a creamy texture when I first dipped my finger in. However as I was blending it on my cheeks I did notice it have a more powdery feel/finish. I love that even though it's a cream blush it doesn't have an oily feel on my skin. It also sits very well on top of foundation and bare skin. I've tried both ways. The color works perfectly with my skin tone and looks so beautiful when it is blended. I went out for the entire day ( in 90 degree heat ) and my blush still looked just as beautiful as when I first applied it. And I'm not even exaggerating. I genuinely love this blush. My only criticism is that I wish there was more product in the pan. It seems like so little. It was my first time using it and my finger was already touching the bottom of the pan. So yea that needs to be addressed. Other than that..... Beautiful blush, loved it, and would most definitely recommend it to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product applies beautifully on the skin with just a few taps of your finger tips. The formula melts into your skin and produces the most natural sunkissed look I have ever seen in a blush. This formula is fun to use because it is a buildable product that has the ability to produce different shade intensities. When tapping on the product, it is almost plush-like and bouncy. The longevity of this product lasts around 6 hours before beginning to fade a bit, but for a natural day look it works just fine.   The one drawback I have with this product is the size of the pan and how little product you were truly getting. Because this is a buildable formula, you will end up using this product very quickly and I would have preferred it to be a bigger pan in this component, instead of having the large plastic edge.   I have attached a before and after photo to show the flawless natural sunkissed look I achieve!

reviews.review_title: A must have in my routine!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin

Overall I highly recommend this blush especially if you're a beginner and love versatility in your makeup products! I received this product for free in return my honest opinion and review.

This vegan, paraben-free, gluten-free, cruelty-free, and eco-friendly blush is multitaskingu2014you can apply it on cheeks, lips, and eyes for a natural, radiant look. Essential for any beauty routine. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this is my first nudestix product and was pleasantly surprised!  i was eyeing it when I first saw it on the sephora website, the magenta matte (bright neon-ish pink) color was totally up my alley.  I was lucky enough (and so grateful) to be sent this to try out!  first and foremost, the pacakging came in tact and everything was safe inside. no damaged product nothing fell out, no broken mirror. so good design choice. it is magnetic so it slides and sticks in place.    the blush itself is unique to my collection and i think to the market. it's a soft bouncy powder consistency, but not melt-y like a mac bounce blush or a gelee dior glow blush , it's not a full cream consistency at all.    in my opinion, the best way to pick the product up is with your fingers or a dense dome-type brush. in regards to application process i do treat it like a cream product.  the color is buildable, i think many various skin tones would be able to use this particular shade because you can sheer it out or build it up to pack a punch! love to see more variation and inclusion in that regard as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am medium skinned with dry skin texture. Firstly, the color magenta matte though it looks like a bright pink in the palette it actually looks just the right level of neutral-to-cool pink on my skin tone! Cool pink blushes are hard to find! The texture itself is lightweight, yet buildable which I really appreciate since I hate blushes that are very pigmented and require you to be careful during application. With this blush I can go in with a normal-to-heavy hand and not be too worried that I'll come off looking like a clown. Not powdery either so doesn't create much fallout. Also, love the luxury-feeling magnetic compact that you can continue to stack on - the overall packaging is 10/10 since it makes it very easy to carry around or travel with. Hopefully other brands take a cue from this and make blushes in smaller quantities with packaging that is compact for travel. Overall, highly recommend!

reviews.review_title: A new go-to blush for me!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product for free in exchange for an honest review after using it. I am dark skinned and this pink looks so nice on my skin tone! I love the magnetic compact that you can continue to stack on. The formula is very creamy and comes out to be very matte. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the magnetic packaging of this blush. I was pleasantly surprised when I realized how smooth the texture of this was. I was expecting powder for some reason, even though the name says ALL OVER BALM. Not super pigmented but super buildable. Last all day also. Normally balms will disappear first but not this one. Can't wait to add more to the collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like the formulation of this blush. It is lightweight, yet buildable, and I can apply it easily with either my fingers or a brush. I love how compact the packaging is. This shade is a little off for my complexion and comes off looking orange. It looks better on my lips but I wish I had a different color.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this bush, its so pretty and it has a shine so it highlights at the same time. It looks so pretty on me, and Im dark skinned.

The Nudestix Stax Sunkissed Bkush is a versatile, creamy blush designed for a natural, sun-kissed look. Its buildable formula allows for sheer to medium coverage, making it easy to customize the intensity. The compact, travel-friendly packaging is convenient for on-the-go touch-ups. It blends seamlessly into the skin, leaving a dewy finish that enhances your natural complexion. Ideal for a quick, effortless makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this balm. The color is beautiful, pigmented, and not heavy. The magnetic cap with a mirror is a cute plus.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have used this blush on multiple occasions since receiving it. It blends flawlessly and does not cake up on the skin. This blush gives such a natural flush, I am in love with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Truly amazing! It is highly pigmented and such a beautiful color as well. I was highly satisfied with it and I definitely recommend it and was super excited to get it. I probably would've preferred a darker color for my skin tone but  nevertheless it still looked really nice ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is revolutionary! Not only is it a beautiful color, it also has so many skin loving ingredients! I definitely recommend this! I also love the idea of the stackable! So cute!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This shade is beautiful and vibrant, I love how it looks on me and it's matte because my skin is oily so it was the best option for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love how creamy and pigmented this blush is. It last all day and does not fade. I have oily/combination skin and it seems to hold well. Love the little detachable mirror it comes with as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this and the color was amazing! Honestly what a great product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: so i just tried this nudestixs blush in Pink Love and it is amazing! It goes on super smooth and gives my cheeks a nice rosy glow. I love how easy it is to blend, and it lasts all day. Plus, its the perfect size to throw in my bag for quick touch-ups.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I tested the color Sunkissed. The pigment is beautiful and buildable. It literally makes you look like you spent a couple hours outside in the sun. The packaging is great and makes this such a staple on the go product. Works great on lips, checks and eyes. Lasts for hours! Nudestix is such a great brand and their packaging is always fresh and intuitive. I prefer this cream blush over the popular liquid brands and look forward to trying more shades. Give this one a try!

reviews.review_shade_purchased: Barely Nude - neutral warm rose tan
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Rich skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got this product to try and give an honest review. I applied it to my skin with both my finger and brush and it came out nicely. I typically wouldnt go for this shade because I usually struggle to imagine what it was like on me, but it actually looks amazing and it looks nice on my complexion! I love it and will definitely be purchasing it again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this product was exactly what i was looking for! this shade is the perfect bronzer/brush duo. the packaging is so fascinating and i love the compact mirror! perfect for lips, cheek and face!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this blush because its super pigmented and the color lasts, I was concerned at first when applying it but I use a blending brush and with my contouring it really compliments my face and eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product from Nudestix in exchange for my honest review. The product is a cream/powder formula and I like to apply with my brush, but you could definitely also apply with your finger. I have never considered using a warm terracotta color on my face as I believed it would lean too orange on my skin, but this shade is actually perfect!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is incredible! It's so easy to blend and buildable. It's more pigmented than I thought. I have tan skin which is currently a deeper bronze due to the sun and it showed up very well and natural on my skin. Love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Ive been using this product in my makeup routine for the last couple of weeks and really like it. It sits nicely on my skin and is easy to blend. I love the small compactible size because I can through it in my purse. It has a mirror included which is nice for quick touch ups. Its also magnetic so you dont have to worry about it coming apart.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received as a sample. I thought this color wont be suitable for my skin tone, but heyyy I love it. It brightened up my face and look so natural. The formula is easy to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Very nice product. Recieved the other day. Nice color and very compact

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I receive this product from Nudestix in exchange for my honest review. The color was very pigmented and easy to apply. I apply with my finger and it applies easily but you can also apply with a brush. It is more like a creme/powder formula. You can definitely layer on for more definition. I like the idea of having one color for all over my eyes, cheek and lips. The mirror is convenient for on the go touch up and the magnetic closure is a creative touch. However, at times it takes a bit longer to close :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how pigmented the blush is and also how long it lasts. Also love how the blush comes with a mirror and its very convenient.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a stunning blush and great formula! It has a very soft and bouncy texture that dries down to a weightless powder finish. It applies so easily to the skin and blends out very well. I found that this formula works great on top of liquid/cream products as well as powder. The pigmentation is more on the sheer side but buildable and I found that it works great applied with a dense brush. I LOVE this particular shade of blush, it is a beautiful coral that doesn't pull too warm or pink. I could see this shade working great for a lot of skin tones! The magnetic, stackable component is really cool and great for travel! My only con is the amount of product you get, it contains only 2.5g/.09oz of product. Most cream blushes contain double that amount. Still, it is a beautiful blush formula and I would definitely repurchase myself when I run out!

reviews.review_title: Cute magnetic lid, but hard to apply!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really was surprised & loved the compact when I seen it was a magnetic lid with a mirror & that it had multiple skincare ingredients in it as well.  However, this color does not look good on my light skintone & even though the texture is cool it doesn't apply or blend well with a beauty blender or a brush brush. I even tried applying with my fingers and still didn't get great results so I'm unsure of how to apply it so that you can actually make it look right on your cheeks as it isn't buildable either! I wouldn't recommend this for those reasons I feel it's sadly a waste of money! I got this for free in exchange for my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Super pretty and pigmented! I love the packaging and how slim it is. It makes it easy to travel with! I like that it also comes with a mirror in the lid for touch ups on the go! Super great formula and has a long wear, I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this blush is so smooth & nice! i love the magnetic closure and the mirror within the packaging. it is so convenient when on the go!

reviews.review_title: Great for dry and combination skin!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: In love with how smooth, creamy and hydrating this blush is! It is not super pigmented but if you like a daily minimal makeup look or the 'clean girl' aesthetic then this is definitely your pick. The formula is moisturizing and doesn't dry my skin at all. It is long lasting and stays put for 4-5 hours.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this product in exchange for a review but here are my honest thoughts: I really enjoy this blush, it's easy to apply and is a cream to powder finish, and also like to use it on my lips. It layers nicely over or under everything when I apply it with a brush. I think if I were to compare it to anything, it's kind of halfway between the merit and westman atelier blushes in terms of texture, sheerness, and blendability. The magnetic packaging is strong enough that I'm confident it wouldnt come apart if i chucked it in my makeup bag for on the go too! Overall I'm happy with this blush and the colors are really up my alley too! I'd consider getting the bronzer shade if they released it as a standalone, not just in the set. They should consider releasing more shades of the bronzer so everyone can wear it as well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the lid! The packaging is innovative and cool. I got this product for free for my honest review. And although I love the packaging this color isnt the best for my skin tone i need more  pigment. The texture is fun and its multi purpose which I love

reviews.review_buyer_description: Combination skin
reviews.review_text: A nice product that is compact and versatile. The color payoff is strong when swatched but looks natural on the face. I received the magenta matte so it looked intimidating in the packaging but a nice flush of color on the face.I did have to try blending with my hand and no luck, so tried with blush brush and was able to but a bit difficult to do. I love the magnetic feature. Overall, a good product if you want to buy quite a few shades as they can provide compactness when they stick together.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is very creamy and easy to apply with your fingers. It provides buildable coverage. The color pink love is a very natural and great color for my fair skin tone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Must buy product ! absolutely love love love !!! so light and creamy ! I feel like sabrina carpenter in espresso !

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Rich skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love the way this blends and looks super smooth! Color payoff is amazing on darker skin, and didnt crease all day! A new staple in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I loved the container and the fact that the lid snaps back in place with magnets. It was just so fun to play with the container! I was surprised that the color actually worked quite well for me considering that it was much more orange in person. The texture was a bit dry, but it was blendable and buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I really liked the color and that its a creamy consistency. The blush doesnt last all day and is not buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loooooove my Nudestix blushes. I usually warm the product up in my palm and then use a brush to apply it to my face. Using it directly and making cute little hearts on the cheeks also works and makes me feel pretty. It lasts all day and doesnt pick up foundation underneath. It's also pigmented , blends easily, never patchy, and buildable. I love the magnetic compact package. It's convenient to keep in my bag in case touch up needed. 100% recommend!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I was so excited to try this blush out. Its so pigmented and the color is just gorgeous. Its the perfect neutral pink. I love how this doesnt have any clog pouring ingredients which is the most imortant thing for me as someone who is very acne prone. I also love how compact this is and how it the lid is magnetic. Its such a cute concept!   thing for me as someone who is very acne prone.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: $24 for 2.5g ($9.60 per gram) worth of product? When I can get nearly 3x the amount at MAC - glow play blush is $34 for 7.4g ($4.69 per gram). Lets be smarter consumers and hold these brands accountable. Xo

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Blends beautifully and perfect size for on the go multi tasking blush.
My new favourite blush! I love the smooth application! My fave is love & roses

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Cheeky coral is a nice peachy blush shade that fits perfectly for my skintone plus the product blends well and doesnt create dry patches on my skin which I super love! The product also comes with a mirror which makes me love it even more!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: My new fav! Im no expert with when it comes to applying blush but I press apply it with a puff and it applies so naturally that you cant go wrong with the outcome. Im so happy with my Stax... and I love how I can carry all my favorite shades around so easily which are the Melon Sugar, Picante Nude, and Pink Love. Definitely a game changer in my everyday look :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Im obsessing with this blush! The texture is cloud like (bouncy) but lays down as a powder. Love the magnetic flat packaging for travel too!!
